title: Practice Theory-Based Elementary Mathematics Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and educational field contexts
context.additional_context: Learning design applying practical theory for in-service elementary math educators, improving real-world application skills via project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Using a practice theory framework, learners can analyze problems in mathematics education settings and develop solution strategies.
Through collaboration with peers and case studies, learners can derive at least three innovative methods applicable to mathematics education practice.
As a project outcome, learners can develop and present a practice-based model that solves specific problems in mathematics education.

resources: Case study materials related to practice theory

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
